item.title: Meahjohn Auto Import and Car Rental
item.description:
About Us

Meahjohn Auto Import and Car Rental specializes in car rentals and roll-on roll-off vehicle imports. With a focus on customer satisfaction and a diverse fleet of vehicles, we provide seamless solutions for both short-term and long-term transportation needs.

Our Services

  • Car Rentals: Wide selection of vehicles for all your transportation needs
  • Vehicle Imports: Professional roll-on roll-off vehicle import services

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Andy Meahjohn
  • Phone: 649-3309
  • Email: emssl05@gmail.com

item.title: Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage
item.description:
About Us

Baldhead Diesel Mechanic Garage specializes in the repair of heavy equipment and the installation of automatic tarpaulin systems. With a team of skilled technicians, we ensure reliable service and high-quality workmanship to keep your machinery running smoothly.

Our Services

  • Heavy Equipment Repair: Expert repair services for all types of heavy machinery
  • Tarpaulin Systems: Professional installation of automatic tarpaulin systems
  • Diesel Services: Comprehensive diesel engine maintenance and repairs
  • Equipment Maintenance: Regular maintenance programs to prevent breakdowns

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Terrance Raghunanan (Kurth)
  • Phone: 734-1245
  • Email: kurth.raghunanan6@gmail.com

item.title: Jagson's Automotive General Ltd Service Centre
item.description:
About Us

Jagson’s Automotive General Ltd Service Centre offers comprehensive vehicle services including inspections, alignments, battery sales, and tyre balancing. With expertise in general tune-ups, oil changes, and brake and suspension repairs, we ensure your vehicle runs smoothly and safely.

Our Services

  • Vehicle Inspection: Complete vehicle safety and performance inspections
  • Wheel Alignment: Professional wheel alignment services
  • Battery Sales: Quality automotive batteries and installation
  • Tyre Services: Tyre balancing and speed balancing
  • General Tune-up: Comprehensive vehicle maintenance
  • Oil Change: Professional oil change services
  • Brake & Suspension: Expert brake and suspension system repairs

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Clint Singh
  • Primary Phone: +1 868 366 7772
  • Secondary Phone: +1 868 393 8698
  • Additional Phone: +1 868 648 8694

Business Hours

Monday - Friday: 8:00 AM - 5:00 PM Saturday: 8:00 AM - 1:00 PM Sunday: Closed
